snippet: At Segera, a 50,000-acre ranch on Kenya’s Laikipia Plateau, guests can relax in style — while giving back to the place they’re visiting.
lead_paragraph: At Segera, a 50,000-acre ranch on Kenya’s Laikipia Plateau, guests can relax in style — while giving back to the place they’re visiting.

headline.main: An African Eco-Resort With a Greater Sense of Purpose
